org.sd.cluster.job
Class WorkServerClientJob

java.lang.Object
  org.sd.cluster.job.AbstractJob
      org.sd.cluster.job.OldAbstractJob
          org.sd.cluster.job.WorkServerClientJob
All Implemented Interfaces:
Clusterable, Message, Job, Publishable
Direct Known Subclasses:
WorkServerClientWithOutputJob
public abstract class WorkServerClientJob
extends OldAbstractJob

Abstract implementation of a job that will be a client to a work server.

Extenders must implement OldAbstractJob.doNextOperation.

Author:
Spence Koehler
